      • findTask

        public java.lang.String findTask​(java.lang.String message)
                          throws DukeExceptionEmptyList
        Users to search a task from the current list in accordance with the keyword he typed in.
        Parameters:
        message - The keyword user typed in to search
        Returns:
        The list of tasks which has the closest result from the searched keyword.
        Throws:
        DukeExceptionEmptyList - If the list is empty.

        public java.lang.String deleteTask​(java.lang.String message)
                            throws DukeExceptionInvalidTaskInputFormat
        Duke deletes a task as defined by users.
        Parameters:
        message - The selected task as defined by user to delete.
        Returns:
        The task that was deleted.
        Throws:
        DukeExceptionInvalidTaskInputFormat - when users' input is not readable by duke.
